@Imuya Also, in Ch, he mentioned never looked at his sister like that when Takahashi talked about her breasts. But now that he said, he became conscious about it when she hugged in ch 2. So he may not have her liked that way from the start, but he's slowly starting to see her as a woman. That's how this type of Japanese anime incest tends to go, especially after their parents dies. Always help if your siblings are hot af. Otherwise, why else is there so much emphasis on him if he doesn't see her that way? I mean, if he didn't see her at all that way, like the MC from Dabo/Fallen Mother, then yeah I could definitely see that. Otherwise, this is not your described scenario. At least, not after the beginning part. He's starting to bloom as a man- too late, though.

@Imuya Actually, I stand by my initial statement. It kept bugging me that he should've had some feelings for his sister like that. And I went back through the chapters just now. And it checks out. How can he view her as parents when they just died kind of recently? Look at the scene where he said his parents died. Him, Takahashi, and his sisters are all the same age and appearance. So it can be said that it was pretty recent death. So how can he view his sisters as parental figures already in that short period of time?? Also, what brought him out of his depression wasn't his sisters or their cuddling, it was his friend Takahashi. So I suggest you reread it again.

@Big_Cookie - apart from the very obvious one (p.31), someone on Sadpanda's comment section for this covered some other obvious minstranslations (Vandalgon). While I could care less about the story at this point, the scanlation group behind this asks for $1.80 estimate per PAGE for their commission. I'm sure no one's dumb enough to pay for that and that the price to commission this is lower, but if someone did - hats off to you, and shame on the scanlators. I'm obviously biased since I work with someone to scanlate some NTR we like for fun, and we QC it thoroughly to make sure it looks good. This looked rushed.

@magna-sama - Fuetakishi only releases during Comiket so you're gonna wait 'til August man. That is, if he doesn't drop this without any conclusion like he kinda did with the Yankee NTR. Probably not since it's been a huge cash magnet on the Japanese market.

@ゆりゆり i copy pasted this somewhere since this basically what i was thinking This is NTR, but not the traditional definition. The brother is literally their brother and neither side has sexual interest in each other. The friend is making them sexually aware, and taking them away from that sibling role-- but that is the natural progress in ANY family when a sibling gets a boyfriend/girlfriend. But the main issue here why the kid brother wanted attention is because they lost their mom. And from the first chapter stated looked like he was really attached to their mom since he was near suicidal on the first chapter with only his sisters left as family. Wouldnt be surprised if the kid brother commits suicide in the end of this shitshow since he's mentally unstable.

@Slathor Duhhh. Where have you been? Don't you know that incest is pretty common in Japanese anime? Even if it's not heavily incest themed, there is still that sort of incestuous inclination feeling between family members, especially siblings. I mean, why do you think the beta cuck male tries so hard to earn the praise of his sisters? 2 volumes ago, he felt excited by his sister's attention and had a hot and bothered expression on his face when he was trying to impress with his "gaming skills" (rolls eyes).
